activities: eForensics LAB is a consulting and service company that provides legal technology services and business solutions primarily to law firms, corporate legal departments, financial and accounting firms. We are single source for integrated solutions, maximizing productivity and easing the challenges of information access, control and dissemination. All data collected in the course of eForensics Lab’s activities are kept under strict privacy and confidentiality protocols since much of this information may constitute evidence in litigation and other sensitive proceedings.
contactoff1: 2001 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW C100 Wahington, DC 20006
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data collected from current, former and prospective eFL clients, employees and other third parties.
recoursemech: eForensics Lab will cooperate and comply with the EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Data Protection and Information Commissioner to investigate all unresolved complaints, regardless of the type of data involved.
